label: The Sun
fact: It takes 8.5 minutes for the light to get to Earth from The Sun.

label: Mercury
fact: One year on Mercury is 88 earth days.

label: Venus
fact: Venus is the only planet with its day longer than a year.

label: Mars
fact: Mars is red because of all the iron in its rocks.

label: Jupiter
fact: The stripes you see are bands of clouds.

label: Saturn
fact: Obvious because of its classic rings.

label: Pluto
fact: You can tell by it's heart shaped feature.
